name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: President Trump is coming off his worst week since ... his last worst week, which I think was the week before last week.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Sean Spicer’s out, Reince Priebus is out, Trumpcare is dead, and Kim Jong Un has a missile that can reach New York. And weirdly, I don’t feel tired from all the winning yet.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: The president has been very busy repealing and replacing his staff, most notably Anthony Scaramucci, the Mooch, who 10 days ago was named the White House communications director. Today he’s out of a job.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Meanwhile, Donald Trump tweeted about Reince Priebus, who he fired. He wrote, “We accomplished a lot together, and I am proud of him.” That’s two lies in one sentence.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: It will be easier for Reince Priebus to go into a souvenir shop and find a novelty license plate with his name on it than it will be to find a job after this.
